verses.name: Luke 2:43
verses.text: And when they had fulfilled the days, as they returned, the child Jesus tarried behind in Jerusalem; and Joseph and his mother knew not of it.

verses.name: Luke 2:44
verses.text: But they, supposing him to have been in the company, went a day’s journey; and they sought him among their kinsfolk and acquaintance.

verses.name: Luke 2:45
verses.text: And when they found him not, they turned back again to Jerusalem, seeking him.

verses.name: Luke 2:46
verses.text: And it came to pass, that after three days they found him in the temple, sitting in the midst of the doctors, both hearing them, and asking them questions.
